Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Made By SolarCrane
-- Not sure if we want to get content url from roblox function? local ICON_URL = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=100856058' local BOTTLE_MESH_URL = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=100856357' --local ROCKET_MESH_URL = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=100856397' local ROCKET_MESH_URL = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=101005977' local TEXTURE_URL = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=100856280'
local NUMBER_OF_ROCKETS = 3 local ROCKET_LAUNCH_SPEED = 53 local RELOAD_TIME_PER_ROCKET = 0.9 local ROCKET_DEBRIS_TIME = 4 local PROJECTILE_NAME = 'BR_Rocket'
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players')
local BottleInstance local Tool = script.Parent
-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Handle') local Sounds = {equip = WaitForChild(Handle, 'equipSound'), reload = WaitForChild(Handle, 'singleReload'), explode = WaitForChild(Handle, 'explodeSound'), launch = WaitForChild(Handle, 'launchSound') }
local Animations = {['EndReload'] = WaitForChild(Tool, 'EndReload'), ['FireAnim'] = WaitForChild(Tool, 'FireAnim'), ['ReloadLoop'] = WaitForChild(Tool, 'ReloadLoop'), ['StartReload'] = WaitForChild(Tool, 'StartReload'), ['StopFire'] = WaitForChild(Tool, 'StopFire') }
local AnimationTracks = {}
local RocketMineScript = WaitForChild(script, 'RocketMineScript')
-- TODO: keep a list of say object pointers of rockets fired in workspace
local DEBUG_PRINT = false function dPrint(...) if DEBUG_PRINT then print(...) end end
Bottle = {} Bottle_mt = { __index = Bottle}
function PointOnUnitCircle(angle) return Vector3.new(math.cos(angle), 0, math.sin(angle)) end
function CanFire() local character = Tool.Parent if character then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local rightArm = character:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') if humanoid and rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild('RightGrip') if humanoid.Health > 0 and rightGrip then return true end end end return false end
function GetHumanoid() local character = Tool.Parent return character and character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end
function GetTorso() local character = Tool.Parent if character then return character:FindFirstChild('Torso') end end
function Bottle:Create() return setmetatable({rockets = {}, lastRocketAddedTick = tick(), lastFiredTime = tick(), inReload = false}, Bottle_mt) end
function Bottle:OnEquipped() dPrint(self.rockets) Handle.Transparency = 0.55 PlaySound('equip') for _, child in pairs(self:GetPart():GetChildren()) do if child.Name == PROJECTILE_NAME then local nextIndex = self:FirstOpenRocketIndex() if nextIndex then self.rockets[nextIndex] = Rocket:Create(child) end end end for i = 1, NUMBER_OF_ROCKETS do if not self.rockets[i] then local tempRocket = self:AddRocket(i) self.rockets[i] = tempRocket end end end
function Bottle:OnUnequipped() local myTorso = GetTorso() if myTorso then if myTorso:FindFirstChild('spinVelocity') then myTorso:FindFirstChild('spinVelocity').Parent = nil end end end
function Bottle:FirstOpenRocketIndex() local firstOpenIndex = nil for i = 1, NUMBER_OF_ROCKETS do if not self.rockets[i] then firstOpenIndex = i break end end return firstOpenIndex end
function Bottle:OnActivated(targetOverride) if CanFire() then print("Activated") local numRocketsToFire = 0 for i, rocket in pairs(self.rockets) do if rocket then numRocketsToFire = 1 --numRocketsToFire + 1 end end if numRocketsToFire > 0 then print("Has rockets") PlayAnimation('FireAnim') local firedCount = 0 --[[ local spinVelocity = Instance.new('BodyAngularVelocity') spinVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0,11,0) spinVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 400000000, 0) spinVelocity.P = 9000 spinVelocity.Name = 'spinVelocity' local myTorso = GetTorso() if myTorso then --spinVelocity.Parent = myTorso end --]]
--local waitTime = 1.3 --((math.pi*2) / spinVelocity.angularvelocity.Y) / numRocketsToFire for i, rocket in pairs(self.rockets) do if firedCount >= numRocketsToFire then break end --local angle = (2 * math.pi) * (firedCount / numRocketsToFire) --dPrint("Angle:" , angle) --rocket:Launch(waitTime, PointOnUnitCircle(angle)) self.rockets[i] = nil rocket:LaunchTargeted(targetOverride) firedCount = firedCount + 1 self.lastFiredTime = tick() end
--spinVelocity.Parent = nil StopAnimation('FireAnim') end Spawn(function() self:Reload() end) end end
function Bottle:GetPart() return script.Parent:FindFirstChild('Handle') end
function Bottle:WeldToBottle(otherRocket, firstOpenIndex) local rocketPart = otherRocket:GetPart() local bottlePart = self:GetPart() if rocketPart and bottlePart then if not firstOpenIndex then firstOpenIndex = self:FirstOpenRocketIndex() end if not firstOpenIndex then dPrint("Bottle:WeldToBottle: No More space for rockets.") return end local bottleWeld = Instance.new('ManualWeld') bottleWeld.Part0 = bottlePart bottleWeld.Part1 = rocketPart --bottleWeld.C0 = CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, (2 * math.pi) * (firstOpenIndex / NUMBER_OF_ROCKETS)):inverse() * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi / 18, 0) + Vector3.new(0,0.7,0) bottleWeld.C0 = CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0,0) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi / 20, (2 * math.pi) * (firstOpenIndex / NUMBER_OF_ROCKETS)):inverse() + Vector3.new(0,0.87,0) bottleWeld.C1 = CFrame.new() bottleWeld.Parent = rocketPart otherRocket.weld = bottleWeld else dPrint("Bottle:WeldToBottle called but either the bottle or the rocket's parts have not been instantiated yet.") end end
function Bottle:Reload() if self.inReload then return end self.inReload = true wait(3.2) PlayAnimation('StartReload', 1) PlayAnimation('ReloadLoop', 1/3) while Tool and Tool:IsDescendantOf(Workspace) do local firstOpenIndex = self:FirstOpenRocketIndex() if not firstOpenIndex then break end local now = tick() local waitTime = math.max(0, math.max(2.3 - math.min(2.3, now - self.lastFiredTime), RELOAD_TIME_PER_ROCKET)) -- math.min(RELOAD_TIME_PER_ROCKET, now - self.lastRocketAddedTick))) print(waitTime) wait(waitTime) PlaySound('reload') local tempRocket = self:AddRocket(firstOpenIndex) self.rockets[firstOpenIndex] = tempRocket self.lastRocketAddedTick = now StopAnimation('StartReload') end StopAnimation('StartReload') StopAnimation('ReloadLoop') PlayAnimation('EndReload') self.inReload = false end
function Bottle:AddRocket(index) local newRocket = Rocket:Create() newRocket:MakeRocket() self:WeldToBottle(newRocket, index) newRocket:GetPart().Parent = self:GetPart() return newRocket end
Rocket = {} Rocket_mt = { __index = Rocket}
function Rocket:Create(rocketPart) local newRocket = setmetatable({}, Rocket_mt) if rocketPart then newRocket.part = rocketPart local weld = rocketPart:FindFirstChild('ManualWeld') if weld then newRocket.weld = weld end end return newRocket end
function Rocket:GetPart() return self.part end
function Rocket:MakeRocket() local rocketPart = Instance.new('Part') rocketPart.TopSurface = 'Smooth' rocketPart.BottomSurface = 'Smooth' rocketPart.FormFactor = 'Custom' rocketPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 3.4) rocketPart.Locked = true rocketPart.CanCollide = false rocketPart.Name = PROJECTILE_NAME local rocketMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') rocketMesh.MeshId = ROCKET_MESH_URL rocketMesh.TextureId = TEXTURE_URL rocketMesh.Parent = rocketPart self.part = rocketPart return rocketPart end
function Rocket:CreateCreatorTag() local myPlayer = PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) if myPlayer then -- Attach creator tags local creatorTag = Instance.new('ObjectValue', rocket) creatorTag.Name = 'creator' --NOTE: Must be called 'creator' for website stats creatorTag.Value = myPlayer local iconTag = Instance.new('StringValue', creatorTag) iconTag.Name = 'weaponIcon' iconTag.Value = Tool.TextureId local nameTag = Instance.new('StringValue', creatorTag) nameTag.Name = 'weaponName' nameTag.Value = Tool.Name return creatorTag end end
function Rocket:LaunchTargeted(targetPosition) local rocketPart = self:GetPart() local humanoid = GetHumanoid() if rocketPart and humanoid then PlaySound('launch') local fire = Instance.new('Fire') fire.Size = 3 fire.Heat = 5 fire.Name = 'RocketTrail' fire.Parent = rocketPart
targetPosition = targetPosition or humanoid.TargetPoint dPrint("TargetPos:", targetPosition) --[[ local targetPart = Instance.new('Part') targetPart.Transparency = 1 targetPart.CanCollide = false targetPart.Anchored = true targetPart.FormFactor = 'Custom' targetPart.Size = Vector3.new() targetPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(targetPosition) targetPart.Parent = Workspace DebrisService:AddItem(targetPart, ROCKET_DEBRIS_TIME + 1) --]] rocketPart.Parent = Workspace if self.weld then self.weld:Destroy() self.weld = nil end
rocketPart.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,1,0) * ROCKET_LAUNCH_SPEED * 1.8
local rocketPropulsion = Instance.new('RocketPropulsion') --rocketPropulsion.Target = targetPart rocketPropulsion.TargetOffset = rocketPart.CFrame.p + (targetPosition - rocketPart.CFrame.p) -- .unit * 1000000000 rocketPropulsion.CartoonFactor = 0.1 rocketPropulsion.TurnP = 23000 rocketPropulsion.MaxTorque = Vector3.new(1000000000, 100000000, 100000000) rocketPropulsion.MaxSpeed = ROCKET_LAUNCH_SPEED rocketPropulsion.Parent = rocketPart
DebrisService:AddItem(rocketPart, ROCKET_DEBRIS_TIME)
local rocketScriptClone = RocketMineScript:Clone() rocketScriptClone.Parent = rocketPart rocketScriptClone.Disabled = false
local tag = self:CreateCreatorTag() if tag then tag.Parent = rocketPart else dPrint("Was unable to make creator tag in MakeRocket") end if Sounds['explode'] then Sounds['explode']:Clone().Parent = rocketPart end
wait(0.3) rocketPropulsion.TargetOffset = rocketPart.CFrame.p + (targetPosition - rocketPart.CFrame.p).unit * 1000000000 rocketPropulsion:Fire() end end
function Rocket:Launch(launchTime, direction) local rocketPart = self:GetPart() if rocketPart then DebrisService:AddItem(rocketPart, ROCKET_DEBRIS_TIME) rocketPart.Parent = Workspace local fire = Instance.new('Fire') fire.Size = 3 fire.Heat = 5 fire.Name = 'RocketTrail' fire.Parent = rocketPart --[[ local smoke = Instance.new('Smoke') smoke.Size = 0.1 smoke.Opacity = 0.3 smoke.RiseVelocity = 0 smoke.Parent = rocketPart local sparkles = Instance.new('Sparkles') sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(222,33,15) ]] wait(launchTime) if self.weld then self.weld:Destroy() self.weld = nil end
--rocketPart.Velocity = rocketPart.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, ROCKET_LAUNCH_SPEED, 0)) local originalCFrame = rocketPart.CFrame rocketPart.Size = Vector3.new(5, rocketPart.Size.Y, rocketPart.Size.Z) local floatForce = Instance.new('BodyForce') floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, rocketPart:GetMass() * 196.2 / 1.13, 0) floatForce.Parent = rocketPart rocketPart.Velocity = direction.unit * ROCKET_LAUNCH_SPEED rocketPart.RotVelocity = Vector3.new() rocketPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(originalCFrame.p, originalCFrame.p + direction.unit) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi / 2 , 0, 0) dPrint("Shooting at:" , direction.unit) --[[ local myTorso = GetTorso() if myTorso then rocketPart.Velocity = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * ROCKET_LAUNCH_SPEED else dPrint("Rocket Launch, no torso found.") rocketPart.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0, ROCKET_LAUNCH_SPEED) end ]]
local tag = self:CreateCreatorTag() if tag then tag.Parent = rocketPart else dPrint("Was unable to make creator tag in MakeRocket") end
local rocketScriptClone = RocketMineScript:Clone() rocketScriptClone.Parent = rocketPart rocketScriptClone.Disabled = false end end
function PlaySound(soundName, volume) local sound = Sounds[soundName] if sound then if volume then sound.Volume = volume end sound:Play() end end
function PlayAnimation(animName, animSpeed) local animTrack = AnimationTracks[animName] if animTrack then animTrack:Play() end if animSpeed then animTrack:AdjustSpeed(animSpeed) end end
function StopAnimation(animName) local animTrack = AnimationTracks[animName] if animTrack then animTrack:Stop() end end
function LoadAnimationTracks() local myHumanoid = GetHumanoid() if myHumanoid then for animName, animObject in pairs(Animations) do AnimationTracks[animName] = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(animObject) end end end
function StopAllAnimations() for animName, animTrack in pairs(AnimationTracks) do StopAnimation(animName) end end
-- Also activate when the Action Button is pressed local function OnChildAdded(child) if child.Name == 'ActionButtonData' then child.Changed:connect(function(newValue) local bindable = child:FindFirstChild('GetTargetPosition') if bindable and string.sub(newValue, 1, 1) == 'v' then local matches = {} for match in string.gmatch(newValue, '%d+%.?%d*') do table.insert(matches, match) end if #matches == 4 then local screenPosition = Vector2.new(matches[1], matches[2]) local screenSize = Vector2.new(matches[3], matches[4]) local targetPosition = bindable:Invoke(screenPosition, screenSize, {Tool.Parent}) BottleInstance:OnActivated(targetPosition) end end end) end end
BottleInstance = Bottle:Create()
dPrint(BottleInstance.rockets)
Tool.Equipped:connect(function() LoadAnimationTracks() BottleInstance:OnEquipped() end) Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() BottleInstance:OnUnequipped() StopAllAnimations() end) Tool.Activated:connect( function() wait() -- iPad derp, doesn't update targetpoint BottleInstance:OnActivated() end) Tool.ChildAdded:connect(OnChildAdded) --NOTE: Added for Action Button

----------------- --| Constants |-- -----------------
local BLAST_RADIUS = 4.3 local BLAST_PRESSURE = 0 local MAX_DMG = 42
-- Rocket will fly through things named these local ROCKET_IGNORE_LIST = {rocket = 1, handle = 1, effect = 1, water = 1} --NOTE: Keys must be lowercase, values must evaluate to true
ROCKET_IGNORE_LIST[string.lower(script.Parent.Name)] = 1
-------------------- --| WaitForChild |-- --------------------
-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
----------------- --| Variables |-- -----------------
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local Rocket = script.Parent local CreatorTag = WaitForChild(Rocket, 'creator')
local HitHumanoids = {} local ExplosionOrigin local Connection = nil
local CreatorPlayer = CreatorTag.Value if CreatorPlayer.Character and CreatorPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then HitHumanoids[CreatorPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')] = true end
----------------- --| Functions |-- -----------------
-- Adjusted from overpressure formula local function DamageFalloffEquation(distance, startDamage) local distance = math.max(1, distance) local explosionNetWeight = 1.1 local volumeOfHemisphere = math.max(1, math.log(distance)) return startDamage * (explosionNetWeight / volumeOfHemisphere) end
-- Returns the ancestor that contains a Humanoid, if it exists local function FindCharacterAncestor(subject) if subject and subject ~= Workspace then local humanoid = subject:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid then return subject, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(subject.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, creatorTag) -- Add more tags here to customize what tags are available. while humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator') do humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator'):Destroy() end creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end
local function OnExplosionHit(hitPart) if hitPart then local _, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(hitPart.Parent) if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then if not HitHumanoids[humanoid] and ExplosionOrigin then local dmg = DamageFalloffEquation((hitPart.CFrame.p - ExplosionOrigin).magnitude , MAX_DMG) local hitBindable = humanoid:FindFirstChild('Hit') if hitBindable then hitBindable:Invoke(dmg, CreatorTag) else --Not in Roblox Battle TagHumanoid(humanoid, CreatorTag:Clone()) humanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) end HitHumanoids[humanoid] = true end end end end
local Exploded = false
local function Explode() if Exploded then return end Exploded = true -- Create the explosion local explosion = Instance.new('Explosion') explosion.BlastPressure = BLAST_PRESSURE explosion.BlastRadius = BLAST_RADIUS explosion.Position = Rocket.Position explosion.Hit:connect(OnExplosionHit) explosion.Parent = Workspace ExplosionOrigin = Rocket.CFrame.p -- Start playing the boom sound local boomSound = Rocket:FindFirstChild('explodeSound') if boomSound then boomSound:Play() end
-- NOTE: -- If we just destroyed the rocket at this point, the boom sound would be destroyed too, -- so instead we will hide the rocket, keep it in the same spot, and schedule it for deletion
-- Stop playing the swoosh sound local swooshSound = Rocket:FindFirstChild('Swoosh') if swooshSound then swooshSound:Stop() end
-- Put out the fire local fire = Rocket:FindFirstChild('RocketTrail') if fire then fire:Destroy() end
local smoke = Rocket:FindFirstChild('Smoke') if smoke then smoke.Size = 5 smoke.RiseVelocity = 1.3 end
Rocket.Transparency = 1 Rocket.CanCollide = false Rocket.Anchored = true Rocket.CFrame = CFrame.new(Rocket.CFrame.p) DebrisService:AddItem(Rocket, 3)
end
local function OnTouched(otherPart) if Rocket and otherPart then -- Fly through anything in the ignore list if ROCKET_IGNORE_LIST[string.lower(otherPart.Name)] then return end
-- Don't react to creator local myPlayer = CreatorTag.Value if myPlayer and myPlayer.Character and myPlayer.Character:IsAncestorOf(otherPart) then return end
local character = FindCharacterAncestor(otherPart) Explode() -- Destroy the connection so this method won't be called again Connection:disconnect() Rocket.Anchored = true --[[ if character then print("Triggering on " , otherPart.Name) Explode() -- Destroy the connection so this method won't be called again Connection:disconnect() else print("No Character, otherPart:" , otherPart , "character:" , character) Rocket.CFrame = CFrame.new(Rocket.CFrame.p) Rocket.Anchored = true end ]] end end
-------------------- --| Script Logic |-- --------------------
-- Arm the rocket and save the touch connection so we can disconnect it later Connection = Rocket.Touched:connect(OnTouched)
wait(3)
Explode()

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
